alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Phillips; Garfield; Petroleum (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 6:44PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Phillips, northeastern Petroleum and west central Garfield Counties through 745 PM MDT... At 643 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles west of Crooked Creek Rec Area, or 29 miles north of Winnett, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Devils Creek Rec Area, Crooked Creek Rec Area and U L Bend Rec Area. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
